title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List not persisted between sessions
OB: The files that have been previously accessed by the user are not appearing in the File menu MRU (Most Recently Used) list.
EB: The files should appear in the File menu MRU list even after restarting the session.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Open a file from the File menu.
3. Close the application.
4. Restart the application.
5. Check the File menu MRU list to see if the previously opened file is listed.
